thymio

Class ThymioVisualController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ur.mi.events.EventDispatcher
      • de.ur.mi.graphics.GraphicsObject
        • de.ur.mi.graphics.Image
          • thymio.ThymioVisualController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.ur.mi.graphics.Resizable, de.ur.mi.graphics.Scalable

    public class ThymioVisualController
extends de.ur.mi.graphics.Image

    Thymio Controller Class for the Thymio project

    Course: Informationssysteme (SS 2016) Universitaet Regensburg

    Dozent: Prof. Dr. Bernd Ludwig
    Gruppe 6: Bauer Louisa, Durry Jan, Kasberger Korbinian, Mykyttschak Lina Handles the Movement of the "Real-Thymio"
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Korbinian Kasberger: korbinian1.kasberger@stud.uni-regensburg.de
